decoworld.model.world

Interface HasBounty

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Player

    public interface HasBounty
    Objects that have a bounty assigned to them should implement this interface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double addJailTime(float days)
      Adds puts the player in jail, or adds to their sentence if they are already in.
      void addToBounty(int amount)
      Increases the bounty of an object by a set amount Intended to be triggered by criminal activity (Vandilism, Team Kills, etc...)
      void getOutOfJailFree()
      Releases the player from jail.
      void iGotHim(int Bounty)
      The reward for killing a HasBounty object
      boolean isInJail()
      Returns true if the character is in jail

      void resetBounty()
      Resets the bounty of an object to zero Intended to be triggered when the object is 'caught'

    • Method Detail

      • priceOnHead

        int priceOnHead()
        Represents the 'money' offered as a reward for capturing this object. Never lower than zero, nor a non-integer.
        Returns:
        The reward for capturing the object

      • addToBounty

        void addToBounty(int amount)
        Increases the bounty of an object by a set amount Intended to be triggered by criminal activity (Vandilism, Team Kills, etc...)
        Parameters:
        The - amount to increase the bounty by

      • removeFromBounty

        void removeFromBounty(int amount)
        Reduces the bounty of an object by a set amount Intended to be triggered by nice activity (E.g. Healing non-team members)
        Parameters:
        The - amount to reduce the bounty by

      • resetBounty

        void resetBounty()
        Resets the bounty of an object to zero Intended to be triggered when the object is 'caught'

      • isInJail

        boolean isInJail()
        Returns true if the character is in jail
        Returns:
        True/false if the character is in jail

      • addJailTime

        double addJailTime(float days)
        Adds puts the player in jail, or adds to their sentence if they are already in. Intended to be used by the bounty quest system and moderators.
        Parameters:
        The - days to be added to jail time
        Returns:
        The float of remaining days in jail

      • getOutOfJailFree

        void getOutOfJailFree()
        Releases the player from jail.

      • iveBeenCaught

        void iveBeenCaught()
        If a player, send to jail

      • iGotHim

        void iGotHim(int Bounty)
        The reward for killing a HasBounty object
        Parameters:
        Bounty - the bounty to be paid
